charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) &; 21:841(b)(1)(C): POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE LESS THAN FIVE (5) GRAMS OF METHAMPHETAMINE, ITS SALTS, ISOMERS, OR SALTS OF ITS ISOMERS &; 18:2 AIDING AND ABETTING (1s)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCE IMPOSED: CBOP-37 months; 3 years supervised release w/special conditions; $100 SPA

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1)&;(b)(1)(B) Distribution of 5 Grams and More of Methamphetmaine, its Salts, Isomers, or Salts of its Isomers; 18:2 Aiding &; Abetting (2)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCE IMPOSED: CBOP-30 months as to counts 1-3 to run concurrently, 3 years supervised release to run concurrently w/special conditions; $300 SPA

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1)&;(b)(1)(B) Distribution of 5 Grams and More of Methamphetmaine, its Salts, Isomers, or Salts of its Isomers; 18:2 Aiding &; Abetting (2)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCE IMPOSED: CBOP-30 months as to counts 1-3 to run concurrently, 3 years supervised release to run concurrently w/special conditions; $300 SPA

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1)&;(b)(1)(B) Distribution of 5 Grams and More of Methamphetamine, its Salts, Isomers, or Salts of its Isomers; 18:2 Aiding &; Abetting (3)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCE IMPOSED: CBOP-30 months as to counts 1-3 to run concurrently, 3 years supervised release to run concurrently w/special conditions; $300 SPA
